name: Tenda
0:
”Alexa, enable Guest WiFi”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Skill description:
Tenda is an Alexa skill that can be integrated with a router or mesh, allowing users to easily manage and control their home network through voice commands. It provides the following functions:
1. Wi-Fi control: Users can use voice commands to enable or disable the guest Wi-Fi network, such as "Alexa, enable the guest network", "Alexa, enable the Wi-Fi schedule".
2. Signal strength adjustment: Users can control the signal strength through voice commands, such as standard mode, energy-saving mode, and enhanced mode, such as "Alexa, set the signal strength to standard mode".
3. LED indicator: Users can use voice commands to control the LED indicator, such as: "Alexa, turn on the LED indicator"
4. Parental control: Users can use voice commands to manage the parental control function of the home network and control the clients of group management, such as "Alexa, enable the parental control of (group name)"
How to use skills:
1. Buy a Tenda device that supports Alexa voice control.
2. Register an account in Tenda WiFi App.
3. Follow the instructions in the Tenda WiFi App or Alexa App to link the Alexa account with the Tenda account and enable the skills.
4. Use voice commands to control devices bound to the Tenda WiFi App, such as:
Alexa, enable guest Wi-Fi
Alexa, enable the Wi-Fi schedule
